name: Desolate Artifact
description:
A/D or Left/right Arrows - move

W or Up arrow - Jump

Shift or Right click - Dash

made for gdko2023 round 2

PLEASE USE THE DOWNLOADED VERSION FOR IMPROVED AUDIO FEATURES. They don't work in html5 apparently.
